main_definition: relating to or involving the whole nation, country-wide; applicable across all regions of a specific country.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Concerning or pertaining to the entire nation as opposed to local areas or regions within it.
meanings_and_examples.example: The company launched its products nationally, aiming for widespread distribution across all states.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Involving national competition or events that span the entire country.
meanings_and_examples.example: The national championship attracted teams from every corner of the country to compete in a single-elimination format.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Referring to an issue, policy, or event that affects the nation as a whole and is not limited by regional boundaries.
meanings_and_examples.example: The new tax reform was passed on a national level, impacting all citizens regardless of their state.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Relating to activities or initiatives implemented across the entire country at once rather than in isolated areas.
meanings_and_examples.example: During the pandemic, the government rolled out a nationwide vaccination program targeting every citizen.
